definition: a worldly-wise person, make more complex or refined
details:
noun
- a worldly-wise person
= synonyms: man of the world
verb
- make more complex or refined
= example: make more complex or refined
- alter and make impure, as with the intention to deceive
= synonyms: doctor
- practice sophistry
= synonyms: twist
- make less natural or innocent
= example: make less natural or innocent
